definitions: the semitransparent mottled yellow and brown shell of certain turtles, typically used to make jewelry or ornaments.
shortDefinitions: semi-transparent mottled yellow and brown shell of certain turtles

definitions: a synthetic substance made to imitate tortoiseshell.
shortDefinitions: synthetic substance made to imitate tortoiseshell

definitions: a domestic cat with mottled black, brown, and orange markings resembling tortoiseshell.
shortDefinitions: domestic cat with markings resembling tortoiseshell

definitions: a butterfly with mottled orange, yellow, and black markings, and wavy wing margins.

notes.text: Genera Aglais and Nymphalis, subfamily Nymphalinae, family Nymphalidae: several species

shortDefinitions: butterfly with mottled orange, yellow, and black markings
